subject: Re: [junit] Best practice - should I fake, or depend on real world objects?
msgSnippet: ... Quick question: what are you trying to test? Deserialization? or using the deserialized object? Both? (Do you get the hint in the question?) -- J. B.
messageBody:
Jonathan Oddy wrote:

> Does this seem like a resonable direction to be going - or am I setting
> myself up for an unpleasant (unforseen) fall somewhere later down the track?
>
> Any thoughts/criticisms welcome.

Quick question: what are you trying to test? Deserialization? or using
the deserialized object? Both? (Do you get the hint in the question?)
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
Diaspar Software Services
